alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Jackson; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 4:54AM EDT until March 31 at 6:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Northwestern Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida... * Until 530 AM CDT. * At 354 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Graceville to 8 miles northwest of Panama City Beach, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Chipley, Marianna, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Bradford, Parker, Malone, Cottondale, Greenwood, Alford, Wausau, Campbellton, Bascom and Moose Pond. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for southeastern Alabama...the Panhandle of Florida...and southwestern Georgia. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Tallahassee.
